Definition: happening or coming next after the first in a series of similar things or people
Examples:
This is the second time it's happened.
Italy scored a second goal just after half-time.
The second of June/June 2nd
He was the second to arrive.
We have one child and are expecting our second in July.

Definition: a whole number, such as 3 or 4 but not 3.5
Examples: Enter any positive integer between 0 and 255.

Definition: a formal examination of evidence in court by a judge and often a jury, to decide if somebody accused of a crime is guilty or not
Examples:
A murder trial.
He's on trial for murder.
She will stand trial/go on trial for fraud.
The men were arrested but not brought to trial.
The case never came to trial.
She is awaiting trial on corruption charges.
He did not receive a fair trial.
She was detained without trial.
Parker was committed for trial yesterday at Southwark Crown Court.
